name: Air Attack Heli Shoot
description:
Air Attack Heli Shoot is most advanced air shooting combat packed with heavy action. Test your shooting skills in this air force war game, In this game you can experience realistic game war strategy. Shoot from helicopter kill all the enemies and destroy enemies vehicles ships and much more.
* High definition graphics with amazing sounds effects
* Realistic FPS (First Person Shooting) controller
* Unique missions with aerial combat from a helicopter gun shooting on the battlefront
* Action packed enemy characters
* Efficient weapon controls & movement
* Deadliest 3D chopper shooting
